title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture off the heat.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Fry onions, add tomatoes and simmer.
Add cream and grilled chicken pieces.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.
